record.title: JOINT REFERRAL--NOMINATION OF CHRISTOPHER A. PADILLA
record.narrative:
JOINT REFERRAL--NOMINATION OF CHRISTOPHER A. PADILLA -- (Senate - September 20, 2007)

[Page: S11914]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Reid, as in executive session, I ask unanimous consent that PN 861, the nomination of Christopher A. Padilla to be Under Secretary of Commerce for International Trade, be jointly referred to the Finance Committee and the Banking Committee.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
